original_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipmunks Go to the Movies
overview: The Chipmunks Go to the Movies is the eighth and final season of the Alvin and the Chipmunks American animated television series. The series features the singing characters The Chipmunks and The Chipettes, produced by Bagdasarian Productions in association with DIC Entertainment and distributors Nelvana Limited, CINAR and HIT Enterainment PLC. Each episode is a spoof of a Hollywood film like Back to the Future or King Kong.  Simon goes undercover as the crime-fighting "Batmunk" to keep the Jokester from stealing toys; Capt. James T. Duck and Mr. Speck pilot the U.S.S. Bobby Prize and Simon's new invention takes on a life of its own.
title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipmunks Go to the Movies
